ViewObject.Name: TrexHeaderVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT h.header_id, h.org_id, h.order_number, h.version_number, h.cust_po_number customer_po_number, h.source_document_type_id, h.source_document_id, h.order_source_id, h.orig_sys_document_ref, h.ordered_date ordered_date, curr.NAME currency_name, decode(h.attribute1,'PROFORMA-OPEN', TO_CHAR ( NVL(trex_om_calctax_charges_op_pk.trex_calculate_open_lines_tot(h.header_id),0) + trex_om_calctax_charges_op_pk.trex_calculate_charge_tax_open(h.header_id) , fnd_currency.safe_get_format_mask (h.transactional_curr_code, 30) ), TO_CHAR ( oe_totals_grp.get_order_total (h.header_id, NULL, 'ALL') + trex_om_calctax_oncharges_pk.trex_calculate_charge_tax (h.header_id) - oe_totals_grp.get_order_total (h.header_id, NULL, 'TAXES'), fnd_currency.safe_get_format_mask (h.transactional_curr_code, 30) )) order_total, decode(h.attribute1,'PROFORMA-OPEN', TO_CHAR (NVL(trex_om_calctax_charges_op_pk.trex_calculate_open_lines_tot(h.header_id),0), fnd_currency.safe_get_format_mask (h.transactional_curr_code, 30) ), TO_CHAR (oe_totals_grp.get_order_total (h.header_id, NULL, 'LINES'), fnd_currency.safe_get_format_mask (h.transactional_curr_code, 30) )) lines_total, decode(h.attribute1,'PROFORMA-OPEN', '0', TO_CHAR (oe_totals_grp.get_order_total (h.header_id, NULL, 'CHARGES'), fnd_currency.safe_get_format_mask (h.transactional_curr_code, 30) )) charges_total, decode(h.attribute1,'PROFORMA-OPEN', TO_CHAR (trex_om_calctax_charges_op_pk.trex_calculate_charge_tax_open (h.header_id), fnd_currency.safe_get_format_mask (h.transactional_curr_code, 30) ), TO_CHAR (trex_om_calctax_oncharges_pk.trex_calculate_charge_tax (h.header_id), fnd_currency.safe_get_format_mask (h.transactional_curr_code, 30) )) taxes_total, agree.NAME agreement_name, agr.agreement_num agreement_number, agree.revision agreement_version, h.blanket_number, blanket.version_number blanket_version_number, term.description payment_terms, invrule.NAME invoicing_rule, h.sold_to_org_id, h.sold_to_contact_id, h.ship_to_org_id, h.ship_to_contact_id, h.invoice_to_org_id, h.invoice_to_contact_id, h.deliver_to_org_id, h.deliver_to_contact_id, --cust.party_name customer_name, --PVCS Version 1.41 - commented and added below By Rajasekaran V for print primary or chiness customer name print, as per bill to language country NVL(DECODE(trex_common_objects_pk.get_pri_alt_cust_name_flag_fn(h.ship_to_org_id,h.org_id),'Y',cust.known_as,cust.party_name),cust.party_name) customer_name, custacct.account_number customer_number, --sr.NAME salesrep_name, --PVCS Version 1.42 - commented By Ankit Sharma for Salesrep name not appearing issue in INC0933340 NVL(sr.NAME, (select RESOURCE_NAME from JTF_RS_RESOURCE_EXTNS_TL JRRET where JRRET.resource_id =sr.RESOURCE_ID and LANGUAGE = 'US' )) salesrep_name, --added for INC0933340 by Ankit Sharma for salesrep issue sr.email_address salesrep_email, TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, fnd_profile.VALUE ('ICX_DATE_FORMAT_MASK')) date_printed, h.quote_number, h.salesrep_id, fcr.symbol currency_symbol, h.transactional_curr_code currency_code, frlkup.meaning freight_terms, smlkup.meaning shipping_method, h.order_number || '_' || h.version_number || '.pdf' filename, h.flow_status_code, h.user_status_code, h.end_customer_id, h.end_customer_contact_id, h.end_customer_site_use_id, h.sold_to_site_use_id, h.ib_owner, h.ib_installed_at_location, h.ib_current_location, pl.NAME price_list_name, NVL ( (SELECT hcsua.tax_reference FROM hz_cust_accounts hca, hz_cust_acct_sites_all hcasa, hz_cust_site_uses_all hcsua WHERE hca.cust_account_id = h.sold_to_org_id AND hcasa.org_id = h.org_id AND hcasa.cust_account_id = hca.cust_account_id AND hcsua.cust_acct_site_id = hcasa.cust_acct_site_id AND hcsua.org_id = h.org_id AND hcsua.site_use_code = 'SHIP_TO' AND hcsua.status = 'A' AND hcsua.site_use_id = h.ship_to_org_id ), (SELECT hp.tax_reference FROM hz_parties hp, hz_cust_accounts hca WHERE hp.party_id = hca.party_id AND hca.cust_account_id = h.sold_to_org_id ) ) tax_reference, (SELECT hou.telephone_number_1 FROM hr_organization_units_v hou WHERE hou.organization_id = h.ship_from_org_id ) telephone, (SELECT hou.telephone_number_2 FROM hr_organization_units_v hou WHERE hou.organization_id = h.ship_from_org_id ) fax, hl.attribute1 service_contact, hl.attribute2 emails, hl.attribute3 site, hl.attribute4 logo_filename, trex_common_objects_pk.trex_report_vat_no (asp.tax_registration_number) tax_registration_number, haou.NAME ou_name, hl.address_line_1 address_line_1, hl.town_or_city town_or_city, hl.region_2 region, hl.postal_code postal_code, oft.territory_short_name country, h.order_category_code order_category_code, ood.organization_name hdr_ship_from_org, h.freight_terms_code freight_terms_code, (SELECT opa.operand FROM oe_price_adjustments opa WHERE opa.header_id = h.header_id AND opa.list_line_type_code = 'TAX' AND ROWNUM < 2 ) hdr_tax_rate, h.ship_from_org_id ship_from_org_id, whl.location_code wh_location_code, whl.description wh_description, decode(1, (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.address_line_1 FROM MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES_FK_V a, hr_locations haou WHERE a.location_id = haou.location_id and a.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME = (select c.subinventory from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1) and rownum = 1) , (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('020') and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.address_line_1 FROM hr_locations haou WHERE location_code = 'US-BO-SAN ANTONIO' and rownum = 1), whl.address_line_1) wh_address_line_1, decode(1, (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.address_line_2 FROM MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES_FK_V a, hr_locations haou WHERE a.location_id = haou.location_id and a.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME = (select c.subinventory from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1) and rownum = 1) , (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('020') and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.address_line_2 FROM hr_locations haou WHERE location_code = 'US-BO-SAN ANTONIO' and rownum = 1), whl.address_line_2) wh_address_line_2, decode(1, (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.address_line_3 FROM MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES_FK_V a, hr_locations haou WHERE a.location_id = haou.location_id and a.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME = (select c.subinventory from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1) and rownum = 1) , (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('020') and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.address_line_3 FROM hr_locations haou WHERE location_code = 'US-BO-SAN ANTONIO' and rownum = 1), whl.address_line_3) wh_address_line_3, decode(1, (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.town_or_city FROM MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES_FK_V a, hr_locations haou WHERE a.location_id = haou.location_id and a.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME = (select c.subinventory from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1) and rownum = 1) , (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('020') and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.town_or_city FROM hr_locations haou WHERE location_code = 'US-BO-SAN ANTONIO' and rownum = 1), whl.town_or_city) wh_town_or_city, decode(1, (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.region_1 FROM MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES_FK_V a, hr_locations haou WHERE a.location_id = haou.location_id and a.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME = (select c.subinventory from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1) and rownum = 1) , (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('020') and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.region_1 FROM hr_locations haou WHERE location_code = 'US-BO-SAN ANTONIO' and rownum = 1), (NVL ( (SELECT meaning FROM fnd_lookup_values WHERE 1 = 1 AND lookup_type = 'GB_COUNTY' AND lookup_code = LTRIM (RTRIM (whl.region_1)) AND LANGUAGE = USERENV ('LANG') AND enabled_flag = 'Y' ), whl.region_1 ) )) wh_region_1, decode(1, (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.postal_code FROM MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES_FK_V a, hr_locations haou WHERE a.location_id = haou.location_id and a.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME = (select c.subinventory from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1) and rownum = 1) , (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('020') and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.postal_code FROM hr_locations haou WHERE location_code = 'US-BO-SAN ANTONIO' and rownum = 1), whl.postal_code) wh_postal_code, decode(1, (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.country FROM MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES_FK_V a, hr_locations haou WHERE a.location_id = haou.location_id and a.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME = (select c.subinventory from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1) and rownum = 1) , (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('020') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.country FROM hr_locations haou WHERE location_code = 'US-BO-SAN ANTONIO' and rownum = 1), whl.country) wh_country, decode(1, (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT arp_addr_label_pkg.format_address (NULL, haou.address_line_1, haou.address_line_2,haou.address_line_3,NULL, haou.town_or_city, haou.region_1, haou.region_2, NULL, haou.postal_code, NULL, country, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'N', 'N', 40, 8, 8) FROM MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES_FK_V a, hr_locations haou WHERE a.location_id = haou.location_id and a.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME = (select c.subinventory from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1) AND country <> 'CH' and rownum =1) , (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('020') and rownum = 1), (SELECT arp_addr_label_pkg.format_address (NULL, haou.address_line_1, haou.address_line_2,haou.address_line_3,NULL, haou.town_or_city, haou.region_1, haou.region_2, NULL, haou.postal_code, NULL, country, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'N', 'N', 40, 8, 8) FROM hr_locations haou WHERE location_code = 'US-BO-SAN ANTONIO' and rownum =1) , arp_addr_label_pkg.format_address (NULL, whl.address_line_1, whl.address_line_2, whl.address_line_3, NULL, whl.town_or_city, NULL, whl.region_1, whl.region_2, whl.postal_code, UPPER (oft1.territory_short_name), whl.country, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'N', 'N', 40, 8, 8 ) ) wh_formatted_address, h.attribute20 attribute20, otl.description order_type, h.transaction_phase_code transaction_phase_code, TO_CHAR (h.expiration_date, 'DD-MON-YYYY') expiration_date, TO_CHAR (h.quote_date, 'DD-MON-YYYY') quote_date, ood.organization_code ship_from_org_code, --fnd_profile.VALUE ('ICX_REPORT_IMAGES') images_url, --commented by Malliga fnd_profile.VALUE ('ICX_OA_MEDIA') images_url, --added by Malliga (SELECT jrd.role_name FROM jtf_rs_salesreps jrs, jtf_rs_defresroles_vl jrd WHERE jrs.salesrep_id = sr.salesrep_id AND jrd.role_resource_id(+) = jrs.resource_id AND NVL (jrd.delete_flag(+), 'N') <> 'Y' AND jrd.role_resource_type(+) = 'RS_INDIVIDUAL' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN NVL (jrd.res_rl_start_date(+), SYSDATE) AND NVL (jrd.res_rl_end_date(+), SYSDATE) AND ROWNUM < 2 ) contact_title, arp_addr_label_pkg.format_address (NULL, ship_loc.address1, ship_loc.address2, ship_loc.address3, ship_loc.address4, ship_loc.city, ship_loc.state, NULL, NULL, ship_loc.postal_code, NULL, ship_loc.country, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'N', 'N', 40, 8, 8 ) intermediate_ship_to, dfv.freight_payment_term freight_payment_terms, dfv.named_place_or_port, (SELECT 'Y' FROM fnd_attachment_functions fndattfn, fnd_doc_category_usages fndcatusg, fnd_documents_vl fnddoc, fnd_attached_documents fndattdoc WHERE pk1_value = h.header_id AND fndattfn.attachment_function_id = fndcatusg.attachment_function_id AND fndcatusg.category_id = fnddoc.category_id AND fnddoc.document_id = fndattdoc.document_id AND fndattfn.function_name = 'OEXOEACK' AND fndattdoc.entity_name = 'OE_ORDER_HEADERS' AND fnddoc.category_description LIKE 'Terex Customer T%C' ) customer_specific_t_c, (SELECT 1 FROM fnd_attachment_functions fndattfn, fnd_doc_category_usages_vl fndcatusg, fnd_documents_vl fnddoc, fnd_attached_documents fndattdoc, fnd_documents_short_text st WHERE pk1_value = h.header_id AND fndattfn.attachment_function_id = fndcatusg.attachment_function_id AND fndcatusg.category_id = fnddoc.category_id AND fnddoc.document_id = fndattdoc.document_id AND fndattfn.function_name = 'OEXOEACK' AND fndcatusg.function_name = fndattfn.function_name AND fndattdoc.entity_name = 'OE_ORDER_HEADERS' AND fnddoc.media_id = st.media_id AND fndcatusg.user_name LIKE 'Terex Customer T_C' ) tac_display_flag, trex_common_objects_pk.get_operating_unit_code (h.org_id) operating_unit, DECODE (otl.description, 'FINANCED', 'FINANCED', NULL ) financed_order, DECODE (ot.order_category_code, 'RETURN', 'RETURN', (SELECT account_name FROM hz_cust_accounts WHERE cust_account_id = h.sold_to_org_id )) base_order_type, TO_CHAR (oe_totals_grp.get_order_total (h.header_id, NULL, 'ALL') - oe_totals_grp.get_order_total (h.header_id, NULL, 'TAXES'), fnd_currency.safe_get_format_mask (h.transactional_curr_code, 30) ) order_total_no_tax, decode(1, (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.telephone_number_1 FROM MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES_FK_V a, hr_locations haou WHERE a.location_id = haou.location_id and a.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME = (select c.subinventory from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1) and rownum = 1) , (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('020') and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.telephone_number_1 FROM hr_locations haou WHERE location_code = 'US-BO-SAN ANTONIO' and rownum = 1), whl.telephone_number_1) warehouse_phone, decode(1, (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.REGION_2 FROM MTL_SECONDARY_INVENTORIES_FK_V a, hr_locations haou WHERE a.location_id = haou.location_id and a.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME = (select c.subinventory from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('015') and c.subinventory is not null and rownum = 1) and rownum = 1) , (select 1 from oe_order_lines_all c,org_organization_definitions b where c.ship_from_org_id = b.organization_id and c.header_id = h.header_id and b.organization_code in ('020') and rownum = 1), (SELECT haou.REGION_2 FROM hr_locations haou WHERE location_code = 'US-BO-SAN ANTONIO' and rownum = 1), whl.region_2) wh_region_2, oft1.territory_short_name wh_country_name, (SELECT 'Y' FROM fnd_attachment_functions fndattfn, fnd_doc_category_usages fndcatusg, fnd_documents_vl fnddoc, fnd_attached_documents fndattdoc WHERE pk1_value = h.header_id AND fndattfn.attachment_function_id = fndcatusg.attachment_function_id AND fndcatusg.category_id = fnddoc.category_id AND fnddoc.document_id = fndattdoc.document_id AND fndattfn.function_name = 'OEXOEACK' AND fndattdoc.entity_name = 'OE_ORDER_HEADERS' AND fnddoc.category_description LIKE 'Terex RMA - Ship To' ) rma_ship_to_attchmt_exists, (SELECT NVL (rprg.attribute_value, jrr.attribute_value) FROM (SELECT jrp.organization_id, jrp.regime_org_id, jrr.registration_id, jrr.attribute_value, jrp.location_id FROM JAI_RGM_DEFINITIONS jr, JAI_RGM_REGISTRATIONS jrr, jai_rgm_parties jrp WHERE UPPER (jr.regime_code) = 'VAT' AND jr.regime_id = jrr.regime_id AND UPPER (jrr.attribute_code) = 'REGISTRATION_NO' AND jr.regime_id = jrp.regime_id ) jrr, jai_rgm_party_regns rprg, oe_order_lines_all ool, JAI_INV_SUBINV_DTLS jisld, hr_locations hl WHERE ool.header_id = h.header_id AND NVL (ool.cancelled_flag, 'N') = 'N' AND ool.subinventory = jisld.sub_inventory_name(+) AND ool.ship_from_org_id = jisld.organization_id(+) AND UPPER (hl.location_code) LIKE '%HOSUR%' AND hl.inventory_organization_id = ool.ship_from_org_id AND jrr.organization_id = ool.ship_from_org_id AND jrr.location_id = NVL (jisld.location_id, hl.location_id) AND jrr.regime_org_id = rprg.regime_org_id(+) AND jrr.registration_id = rprg.registration_id(+) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) tin_for_seller, ( SELECT jihou.cst_reg_no FROM JAI_CMN_INVENTORY_ORGS jihou, oe_order_lines_all ool, JAI_INV_SUBINV_DTLS jisld, hr_locations hl WHERE ool.header_id = h.header_id AND NVL (ool.cancelled_flag, 'N') = 'N' AND ool.subinventory = jisld.sub_inventory_name(+) AND ool.ship_from_org_id = jisld.organization_id(+) AND UPPER (hl.location_code) LIKE '%HOSUR%' AND hl.inventory_organization_id = ool.ship_from_org_id AND jihou.organization_id = ool.ship_from_org_id AND jihou.location_id = NVL (jisld.location_id, hl.location_id) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) cst_for_seller, (SELECT vat_reg_no FROM JAI_CMN_CUS_ADDRESSES jica, hz_cust_site_uses_all hcs WHERE jica.customer_id = h.sold_to_org_id AND jica.address_id = hcs.cust_acct_site_id AND hcs.site_use_id
